description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Fixed the crash when clicking on Liteloader installation
2. Fixed the issue where the April Fool's version category appeared in the mod loader interface
3. Fixed the issue of being unable to launch 25w43a
4. Removed the horizontal screen lock on the crash interface

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复点击Liteloader安装闪退的问题
2.修复模组加载器界面出现愚人节版本分类的问题
3.修复无法启动25w43a的问题
4.取消崩溃界面的横屏横屏锁定
